isCustom.description: Indicates that the icon shown is not from any of Bulma's sources

src.description: Indicates link related to the custom icon that will be shown

alt.description: Displays an alternative text when the icon can't be shown

size.description: Sets a size in pixels based on a numeric input

cssClasses.description: String of custom CSS classes that can be injected into the component (works for custom and not-custom versions)
